alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 03 at 3:34AM CDT until October 03 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Regions of Aransas, Kleberg, Nueces, San Patricio, Refugio and Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Advisory, until 7 AM CDT this morning. For the second Coastal Flood Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio
